Question: In 2009, this person collaborated with Nike to release his own shoe, the Air Yeezys, with a second version released in 2012.
Hints: This person also runs his own record label GOOD Music, home to artists such as John Legend, Mos Def and Big Sean.
This person has since returned to voice the character in two additional episodes.
In November 2010, in a taped interview with Matt Lauer for the Today Show, this person expressed regret for his criticism of Bush.
